overview: The Roaring 20's: Destiny ends up in a 1920's speakeasy where she's captured by a mob boss and threatened with death! But the mob boss doesn't know of Destiny's unique physiology.  The Inquisition: Destiny is befriended by a beautiful young witch after she's wounded by a hunter's arrow. But the young girl and Destiny are captured by witch hunters who torture and then burn the young with alive! Will Destiny survive or duffer a similar fate?
title: Destiny: Vampire Mermaid #2
